location.zh-cn: 香港金钟添马添美道2号政府总部东翼8至10楼
location.en: 8-10/F, East Wing, Central Government Offices, 2 Tim Mei Avenue, Tamar, Admiralty, Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府的决策局之一，主管香港公共秩序，并统管多个纪律部队。
description.en: One of the policy bureaus of the Government of Hong Kong, responsible for public order and overseeing various disciplinary services.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，现任保安局局长，曾任警务处处长。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, current Secretary for Security, and former Commissioner of Police.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，现任保安局副局长。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, current Under Secretary for Security.

description.zh-cn: 香港公务员，现任保安局常任秘书长。
description.en: Hong Kong civil servant, current Permanent Secretary for Security.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，现任保安局局长政治助理。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, current Political Assistant to the Secretary for Security.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区政务司司长

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政务司司长
en: Chief Secretary for Administration of Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府中地位仅次于行政长官的政府官员。
description.en: The government official with the second highest position in the Government of Hong Kong, after the Chief Executive.

description.zh-cn: 香港的警察部门，是香港六个主要纪律部队之一。
description.en: The police department of Hong Kong and one of the six major disciplinary services in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 负责香港出入境管制的纪律部队。
description.en: The disciplinary service responsible for immigration control in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 负责香港关税及管制的纪律部队。
description.en: The disciplinary service responsible for customs and excise control in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 负责管理香港监狱、惩教院所的纪律部队。
description.en: The disciplinary service responsible for managing prisons and correctional institutions in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 负责香港消防与救护服务的纪律部队。
description.en: The disciplinary service responsible for fire and ambulance services in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港的纪律部队之一，提供飞行支援服务。
description.en: One of the disciplinary services in Hong Kong, providing flying support services.

description.zh-cn: 香港保安局辖下负责协调禁毒政策和措施的部门。
description.en: A division under the Security Bureau of Hong Kong responsible for coordinating anti-drug policies and measures.

description.zh-cn: 保安局的前身，于1941年4月设立，专责香港防务。
description.en: The predecessor of the Security Bureau, established in April 1941, responsible for the defense of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 首任防卫司，在香港保卫战后被俘，因协助盟军收集情报而被日军处决。
description.en: The first Defence Secretary, captured after the Battle of Hong Kong and executed by the Japanese military for assisting Allied forces in intelligence gathering.

description.zh-cn: 保安局的前身，由防卫科于1973年5月改称而来。
description.en: The predecessor of the Security Bureau, renamed from the Defence Branch in May 1973.

description.zh-cn: 港英政府时期负责辅佐香港总督的最高级行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body assisting the Governor of Hong Kong during the British Hong Kong period.

description.zh-cn: 首位华人保安司，并在香港主权移交后成为首任保安局局长。
description.en: The first ethnic Chinese Secretary for Security, who became the first Secretary for Security after the handover of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港前保安司，于1995年2月退休。
description.en: Former Secretary for Security of Hong Kong, retired in February 1995.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任保安局局长，因基本法23条立法争议而辞职。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, former Secretary for Security who resigned due to controversy over the Basic Law Article 23 legislation.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区基本法第二十三条

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区基本法第二十三条
en: Article 23 of the Hong Kong Basic Law

description.zh-cn: 《香港特别行政区基本法》中关于国家安全的条文，其立法工作在香港曾引发巨大争议。
description.en: An article in the Basic Law of Hong Kong concerning national security, the legislative process of which caused significant controversy in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 自1997年以来，香港民间人权阵线于每年7月1日（香港特别行政区成立纪念日）举办的游行活动。2003年的游行主要为反对基本法23条立法。
description.en: Marches organized by the Civil Human Rights Front in Hong Kong on July 1st (HKSAR Establishment Day) annually since 1997. The 2003 march was primarily against the Basic Law Article 23 legislation.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任入境事务处处长、廉政专员及保安局局长。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, former Director of Immigration, Commissioner of the ICAC, and Secretary for Security.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任入境事务处处长、保安局副局长及保安局局长。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, former Director of Immigration, Under Secretary for Security, and Secretary for Security.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，现任香港特别行政区行政长官，曾任保安局副局长、保安局局长及政务司司长。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, current Chief Executive of HKSAR, former Under Secretary for Security, Secretary for Security, and Chief Secretary for Administration.

nodes.id: 独立监察警方处理投诉委员会

zh-cn: 独立监察警方处理投诉委员会

description.zh-cn: 指香港主权移交前，港英政府在公务员体系中提升本地华人地位的政策。
description.en: Refers to the policy of the British Hong Kong government to promote local Chinese within the civil service before the handover of Hong Kong.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区政务司司长

description.zh-cn: 保安局是政务司司长辖下的决策局之一。
description.en: The Security Bureau is one of the policy bureaus under the Chief Secretary for Administration.

description.zh-cn: 为应付第二次世界大战爆发后日益紧张的东亚局势，港英政府于1941年4月增设防卫科。
description.en: To cope with the increasingly tense situation in East Asia after the outbreak of World War II, the British Hong Kong Government established the Defence Branch in April 1941.

description.zh-cn: 港英政府于1941年4月设立防卫科，专责香港防务。
description.en: The British Hong Kong Government established the Defence Branch in April 1941 to be responsible for the defense of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 防卫科于1973年5月改称为保安科。
description.en: The Defence Branch was renamed the Security Branch in May 1973.

description.zh-cn: 保安科是布政司署下辖的部门。
description.en: The Security Branch was a department under the Chief Secretary's Office.

description.zh-cn: 1997年7月1日香港主权移交后，保安科改为保安局。
description.en: After the handover of Hong Kong on July 1, 1997, the Security Branch was renamed the Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 香港主权移交导致政府架构重组，保安科改组为保安局。
description.en: The handover of Hong Kong led to a government restructuring, in which the Security Branch was reorganized into the Security Bureau.

relationships.source: 香港特别行政区基本法第二十三条

description.zh-cn: 对《香港特别行政区基本法》第二十三条立法的反对是2003年七一大游行的主要原因之一。
description.en: Opposition to the legislation of Article 23 of the Hong Kong Basic Law was one of the main reasons for the July 1st march in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 因基本法23条立法引发的七一大游行后，时任保安局局长叶刘淑仪申请辞职。
description.en: Following the July 1st march triggered by the legislation of Basic Law Article 23, then-Secretary for Security Regina Ip applied to resign.

description.zh-cn: 傅瑞宪因被发现协助盟军收集情报，于1943年10月遭日军处决。
description.en: After being discovered assisting Allied forces in intelligence gathering, John Alexander Fraser was executed by the Japanese military in October 1943.

description.zh-cn: 为响应香港主权移交前的本地化政策，首位华人保安司黎庆宁在1995年2月上任。
description.en: In response to the localisation policy before the handover of Hong Kong, the first ethnic Chinese Secretary for Security, Peter Lai, took office in February 1995.

description.zh-cn: 2002年7月1日开始实行主要官员问责制，保安局局长由公务员改为政治任命。
description.en: With the implementation of the Principal Officials Accountability System on July 1, 2002, the position of Secretary for Security was changed from a civil service post to a political appointment.

description.zh-cn: 香港警务处是保安局下辖的纪律部队之一。
description.en: The Hong Kong Police Force is one of the disciplinary services under the Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 入境事务处是保安局下辖的纪律部队之一。
description.en: The Immigration Department is one of the disciplinary services under the Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 香港海关是保安局下辖的纪律部队之一。
description.en: The Customs and Excise Department is one of the disciplinary services under the Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 香港惩教署是保安局下辖的纪律部队之一。
description.en: The Hong Kong Correctional Services is one of the disciplinary services under the Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 香港消防处是保安局下辖的纪律部队之一。
description.en: The Hong Kong Fire Services Department is one of the disciplinary services under the Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 政府飞行服务队是保安局下辖的纪律部队之一。
description.en: The Government Flying Service is one of the disciplinary services under the Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 禁毒处是保安局下辖的部门。
description.en: The Narcotics Division is a department under the Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 医疗辅助队是保安局下辖的部门。
description.en: The Auxiliary Medical Service is a department under the Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 民众安全服务队是保安局下辖的部门。
description.en: The Civil Aid Service is a department under the Security Bureau.

relationships.source: 独立监察警方处理投诉委员会

description.zh-cn: 独立监察警方处理投诉委员会是保安局下辖的公营机构。
description.en: The Independent Police Complaints Council is a public body under the Security Bureau.
